data.title: 50 Years of Sunshine

data.meta_site_name: Explore Wasaga Beach - Your Ultimate Guide to Attractions, Activities, and Accommodations
data.text:
Want the best seats in the house for a live music experience you will never forget?

VIP tickets for the Town of Wasaga Beach’s 50th Anniversary Celebration are on sale now – but hurry! Space is limited.

On July 27, 2024, join us under the stars on the longest freshwater beach in the world for live performances by rock icons The Carpet Frogs, plus Barstool Confessions and Boomerang — and take in one of the most spectacular sunsets on earth.

For $10-$20 get access to the best seats in the house, unique food trucks and our exclusive, family-friendly beer garden presented by Side Launch Brewing Company.

Check out the full event schedule below!

SATURDAY JULY 27TH– Event Square

50th Anniversary – Saturday July 27th Main Stage Time Performances 8:00am-9:00pm Beach Yoga (Presented By: Wasaga Beach Yoga) 9:00am- 11:00am Pancake Breakfast (Presented By: Kinettes Club of Wasaga Beach) 10:00am-3:30pm Craft Tents 10:00am-10:15am Golden Boys 10:15am-10:30am Break-dancers 10:30am- 11:10am Tyler Boyle Dance Party 11:30am-12:30pm Bubble stilt walkers 1:00pm-1:15pm Golden Boys 1:15pm-1:30pm Break-dancers 1:30pm-3:30pm Ariel demos (Presented By: The Collingwood Circus Club) 4:00pm -10:00pm Beer tent opens (Presented By: Side Launch Brewing) 5:30-6:30 Boomerang 7:00-8:00 Bar Stool Confession 8:00-9:15 The Carpet Frogs

Band Descriptions

Boomerang invites you into a time machine to experience vintage classics from a golden era of soul/R&B music. This eight-piece horn band gets audiences on their feet, celebrating songs that inspired generations to turn down the lights and turn up the volume.

The seasoned Boomerang players have shared stages with many well-known artists. Our dynamic horn section rekindles great melodies from Stevie Wonder to Van Morrison to Wilson Pickett and more, and the rhythm section honours the best of studio musicians, from Motown to Stax Records. Our singer, Gary Diggins, grew up near the Detroit River and brings the spirit of soul music that floated on the Motor City airwaves.

Boomerang is at home on festival stages, in community halls, at private and corporate celebrations, and even at street parties. We know how to transform a big venue into an intimate living room experience!

Website: https://www.boomerangband.ca/

Instagram: @boomerangsoulband

Bar Stool Confession

Barstool Confessions is a Canadian country/rock band and recording artists from Barrie, Ontario. The band was formed in 2018 and consists of members Jeff Hamilton on drums, Brian Fell on bass, Paul Sadlon on lead guitar and Buck Goodbrand on guitar and vocals. Barstool Confessions plays consisten live shows thoughout the year at various venues in Central Ontario. Performing as the opening act for bands including Teenage Head , Big Sugar and Texas Kings.

Website: www.barstoolconfession.com

Instagram: @barstoolconfession

The Carpet Frogs

The Carpet Frogs are a Wasaga Beach based rock band, known for their work performing and touring with Randy Bachman and Burton Cummings and have performed on Canada’s Walk of Fame, Juno Awards, Live 8 Canada, SOCAN Awards, and more.

Website: www.thecarpetfrogs.com
